TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityDesignerTheme extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 為設計階段環境的設計工具提供外觀及操作屬性設定。

span.span: Provides the look and feel property settings to a designer in a design-time environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 設計工具主題可定義設計工具的外觀與操作。Designer themes define the look and feel of a designer. 這包含針對設計工具定義的任何背景樣式、前景樣式、字型和圖示。This includes any background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the designer. 如果您想要提供組態功能給您專屬的設計工具屬性，請建立自訂設計工具主題。You can create a custom designer theme if you want to provide configuration abilities to properties unique to your designer. 如果沒有指定自訂設計工具的設計工具主題，就會使用基底類別 (Base Class) 的主題。If you do not specify a designer theme for a custom designer, the theme from the base class is used. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立自訂 ，其方式是從 類別衍生，並為新主題設定適當的屬性。The following example shows how to create a custom by deriving from the class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#80](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#80)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#80](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#80)] 若要使用 上的主題，請將 套用至 類別。To use the theme on an , apply the to the class. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#79](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#79)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#79](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#79)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，表示背景色彩，或背景漸層的開始色彩。 indicates the background color, or the beginning color of a background gradient. 若要使用背景漸層色彩，請設定 和 屬性。To use background gradient color, set the and properties. 背景會從開始色彩逐漸變成結束色彩。The background will gradually change color from the start color to the end color. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立自訂 ，其方式是從 類別衍生，並為新主題設定適當的屬性。The following example shows how to create a custom by deriving from the class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme. summary.span: 取得或設定背景樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the background style.
A that describes the background style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 來取得或設定背景顯示色彩的方式。Use to get or set how the background displays color. 可以設為四種模式的其中一種：The can be set to one of four modes: `BackwardDiagonal` 指定從右上至左下的漸層。Specifies a gradient from upper right to lower left. `ForwardDiagonal` 指定從左上至右下的漸層。Specifies a gradient from upper left to lower right. `Horizontal` 指定從左至右的漸層。Specifies a gradient from left to right. `Vertical` 指定從上至下的漸層。Specifies a gradient from top to bottom. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立自訂 ，其方式是從 類別衍生，並為新主題設定適當的屬性。The following example shows how to create a custom by deriving from the class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#80](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#80)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#80](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#80)] 若要使用 上的主題，請將 套用至 類別。To use the theme on an , apply the to the class. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#79](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#79)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#79](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#79)]

value.span: 描述設計工具幾何圖形的列舉型別。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示主題形狀的預設幾何圖形。 represents the default geometry of shapes for the theme. `Rectangle` 繪製有方邊角的形狀。Draws shapes with squared corners. `RoundedRectangle` 繪製有圓邊角的形狀。Draws shapes with rounded corners.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 會釋放 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 所使用的 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 `disposing` 為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考之任何 Managed 物件所持有的所有資源。When `disposing` is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

summary.span: 取得主題所使用的文字字型。

span.span: Gets the font of the text used by the theme.
The font of the designer theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Font` 用於顯示設計工具中的文字。`Font` is used to display text in the designer. `Font` 屬性可決定用於設計工具中顯示之標準文字的字型。The `Font` property determines the font to use for regular text displayed in the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，指定主題的前景色彩。Use the property to specify the foreground color of the theme. 前景色彩通常是文字的色彩。The foreground color is usually the color of the text. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立自訂 ，其方式是從 類別衍生，並為新主題設定適當的屬性。The following example shows how to create a custom by deriving from the class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme. summary.span: 取得與主題相關聯的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object associated with the theme.

value.span: 與主題相關聯的 物件。

span.span: A object associated with the theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指派這個屬性會使與主題相關聯的筆刷繪製填滿的直線和曲線。Assigning this property causes the brush associated with the theme to draw filled lines and curves.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ForegroundPen As Pen
public: property System::Drawing::Pen ^ ForegroundPen { System::Drawing::Pen ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ，以用於繪製主題前景。

span.span: Gets the used for painting the foreground of the theme.
A that is used to paint the foreground of the theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用於繪製指定寬度和樣式的線條。The is used to draw a line of a specified width and style. `Pen` 物件繪製的線條，可以用各種填入樣式填滿，包含純色和紋理。The line drawn by a `Pen` object can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures. 填滿樣式是根據做為填色物件的筆刷或紋理。The fill style depends on which brush or texture used as the fill object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Drawing.Brush GetBackgroundBrush(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle rectangle) cil managed

param.name: rectangle
param.span: ，指定背景上區域的位置和大小。

span.span: A that specifies the location and size of the area on the background.

summary.span: 取得筆刷，用於繪製傳遞之矩形所指定的區域。

span.span: Gets a brush used to paint the area specified by the rectangle passed.

returns.span: ，用於填滿圖形形狀內部，例如矩形、橢圓形、派形、多邊形和路徑。

span.span: A that is used to fill interiors of graphical shapes such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 背景筆刷可用來填滿設計工具背景的內部。The background brush is used to fill the interior of the background of the designer.
